Comments
November 20, 2022
tidge
Even as I expect the high-cost versions of familiar AV4E SR characters to be the most desired (Hulk, Thanos, Iron Man), I think Miss America is the best of the single SR pulls from this set... edging out Sentry/Sentry prime because I see those are a sort of 'set'. The top-dial ability to reposition (multiple!) force-mates before and/or after close (multi-target!) attacks is incredibly useful on a relatively low-cost figure. this by itself overshadows the fact that this is a flying, move+attack figure with Empower, serious damage reducers and excellent offense through the entire dial.
